nodes.title: Added option to use native GIT executable instead of JGit implementation, for better performance
Add a Bitdeli Badge to README
Changed maven deprecated method to new one
Added support for git describe when all tags are on different branches
Added ability to generate a git properties file in json format.
Added ability to generate a git properties file in json format.
allow git.branch to return accurate information from Jenkins/Hudson jobs
Update README.md with the latest release
Added auto discovery of .git links for submodules
Changes default directory for git properties
Feature: pass maven props (groupId, artifactId and version) to generated git.properties
Fixed toJson: colon as key-val separator in json.
Add injection of all properties to Maven reactor projects.
Fixed NullPointerException when dotGitDirectory not found and failOnNoGitDirectory = false.
Change git.describe to git.commit.id.describe at README.md to avoid confusion
Untested change to avoid execution when packaging type is "pom". When the
PR for supporting nested multi-module maven projects
#315: deploying the workaround used inside maven-surefire-plugin to be able to skip via configuration and commandline properly
#310: Only properties created by maven-git-commit-id-plugin filtered.
update pom; include more notes about config
#305: URISyntaxException with remote path pointing to windows directory (e.g. file:///C:\Users\test\example)
#288: Use ISO 8601 and or UTC/Offset as default date format
allow to replace certain characters with regex #138
Add Plugin compatibility matrix with maven
Fix support the always flag for the describe command in JGit in shallow clones
Update jgit to the latest version
Added property to skip from CLI
Add default constructor needed for reflection instantiation of the ValidationProperty
Use ObjectMapper's PrettyPrintWriter for JSON output.
Add the 'tags'-option to the main example configuration
Describe the subtle shift in meaning of git.build.time when generated into git.properties.
Adding a new Validation Mojo (as outlined in #106)
Fix #252: Update jgit to the latest Version 4.3.1.201605051710-r
Use `git ls-remote --get-url` to get the remote url
Added code to ensure that passwords are not included git.remote.origin.url
Closest tag function return incorrect value. Fixed comparator
#211 : add a switch to generate the git.commit.id the "old" way
Drop support for java jdk1.6 and fix #122
Re enable Tests and update Readme for the latest version
fix for 196: create a uber-jar as a workaround for maven's class loading problem (MNG-5787)
#54: Reveal describe details (tag name, number of commits)
Fix for #191 slf4j simple-logger for logging
Added includeProperties and additionalProperties as mojo parameters.
Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
getting the readme back to business; added injectAllReactorProjects to the docs
Add missing git.build.host to GitRepositoryState Bean
Introduce a demo-profile inside the pom, see #181
Fix for possible NPE as discussed in #153
fixes #108: only propagate git properties to other maven modules
Fix differences in the output of native and jgit
Feature/issue 51 update properties file when needed only
fix for Allow initialization once per run (with multiple modules) #53
add boolean property: 'files.dirty' if working dir is dirty
Slightly improved exception handling for wrong dotGitDirectory.
Added protection from NullPointerException when dotGitDirectory is wrong.
Added possibility to specify encoding for generated git.properties file
Use svg instead of png to get better image quality
Code Cleanup for issue #93, should fix #110 as well
Fixed bug when using forceLongFormat on gitDescribe
#465: relocate the group-id and artifact-id of the maven-plugin
#458: Have the plugin operate in "offline mode" by default
Drop support for Java 8, Java 9 and Java 10 + Drop Maven 3.0.x
Fix tests for java16+add java17-ea to the test matrix and update dependencies
add support for author and commiter times
Support Bitbucket Pipelines CI for build number and branch
Add an option to obtain properties from a user specified directory
Fix #523: Avoid illegal reflective access warning in JDK11
#531: session.getProjectDependencyGraph() might be `null` when running the plugin from eclipse
#519: fix an issue where special characters in the git URL simply yield: Illegal character in authority
#509: Allow initial 'git.build.time' from 'project.build.outputTimestamp' to support reproducible builds
Build system information should be optionally set
Enable reproducible builds by suppressing date comment in properties
Depend on JUnit 4.12 instead of JUnit 5.5.1
Remove unused Java version matrix from GitHub workflow
Simplify GitHub workflow, cache local Maven repository
Refactor for better readability, fix returning branch name based on tags
Add support for GitHub Actions, some refactoring
CVE-2019-16942: Bump jackson-databind from 2.9.10 to 2.9.10.1 in /core
#413: use maven's PluginParameterExpressionEvaluator to allow replacements with values that contain unresolved variables
#387: make runOnlyOnce run on the first project (and make it work when maven's --projects param are specified)
Issue #438 Populate "git.branch" and "git.build.number" for Azure DevOps
upgrade jackson-databind to fix CVE-2019-14540 and CVE-2019-16335
Allow to override useNativeGit from command line
Fix property caching when using injectAllReactorProjects.
Add filtering capabilities for build server data.
Correct text bold formatting on license text
The new caching should work for reactor builds with different prefixes and injectAllReactorProjects=true
Skip git invocation if properties are already computed
#380 / #401 Cleanup readme & Introduce coveralls / fix travis to reflect the repo migration
#389 allow replacementProperty value to be empty
#336 / #396: apply some refactoring to simplify the entire process launching
#336: fix hanging git subprocess in case of too much output on stdout/stderr.
use openjdk10, add maven 3.6.0 to integration tests
Issue #24 Add property for using CI branch name or not
fixes #387 'runOnlyOnce' & --project make Mojo not run at all
Support jgit 5.1.1, add direct httpclient, and update dependencies
run on eclipse incremental build if properties file was not generated
#346 / #336 / #350: Drop Java 1.7 support / introduce a timeout for any native git command / replace almost every guava feature with Java 8 features
update dependencies + adding oraclejdk10 to tests
Read the output of native git before waiting for it to complete
#352 / #345 : add total commit count property via 'rev-list <commit> --count'
#355: Bamboo generates unsupported gitRemoteString with file://[DIR]
fix  #341 (NullPointerException at pl.project13.jgit.dummy.DatedRevTag) and adding readme section about mvn install/deploy
Feature/221 and Testcleanup (in particular remove the Whitebox class that was borrowed from mockito)
Introduce new travis beta-feature of Build Stages

Improve properties replacement and allow to change the case of letters (#317) and fix the runningOnBuildServer check for detecting the branch name on Jenkins / Hudson to also check 'HUDSON_HOME' and 'JENKINS_HOME' (#326)
